Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, thanksgivings to; Christ, love toward; advice, spiritual
_description: Preparations for offering hospitality to Christ, in a Latin sermon Qui custos domini sui gloriabitur, by Friar Nicholas Philip — four lines
